title: Five-Star Morocco Luxury in the Heart of Fes with Medina Views
description:
Uncover the magic of Morocco with a stay in the heart of Fes at the five-star Hotel Sahrai, a grand establishment and part of the prestigious Small Luxury Hotels of the World collection and ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor.

 Located between the famous medina and the new town, the hotel offers sweeping views from its hilltop location. Revel in the luxury of Hotel Sahrai’s high-end facilities, from the glistening infinity pool to the indulgent Givenchy Spa, three onsite restaurants and ultra-stylish bars, and the health club. When you’re able to tear yourself away from the hotel’s incredible facilities, venture out to discover the wonders of Fes. Lose yourself among the twists and turns of the medina, only a 12-minute drive from the hotel. As you wander along the maze-like streets, skirting donkey carts and tooting merchants, discover authentic food stands, fresh honey stalls, leather goods, perfumeries, gilded lamps and so much more.
